review: We had consulted Abi Mam after long search as we were outsider in Tambram area. she is very professional and well behaved. she understand the problem listen the details very carefully and provide suggestion and solution step by step. she understand your problems and suggest you to consult her as per your convenient time. she treated us as we were not conceiving naturally. After few months try Mam suggested for treatment and it was successful for us. finally we blessed with a baby and thanked Almighty and Mam for helping and guiding us in all possible ways. Will definitely recommend mam for them who are trying hard to get a good news. All the  very best. please try before it became late.

review: Good service and doctor clear and explain about the health problems.now I had cleared about my wife health.

I have taken appointment for me and my husband and we have visited the hospital. The doctor was quite good and she have done our check up. After the check up treatment for given according to it and we are completely 100% satisfied by it. There was no wait time for us as our appointment was on time. In future if any of my friends or family members needs consultation means I would like to recommend this doctor only.
she was so  kind. solved all my queries. felt very comfortable. accepted to give me normal delivery after my previous c section. lowest package i have heard in t city with best comforts

Excellent professional, well explained. Doctor with patient communicate very good.... 
I hope  Regarding my health issues down it's get well very soon
